summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel discussing granting access to a shared drive containing case materials related to the US v. Epstein investigation. The chain includes an attached December 2019 memo summarizing the post-indictment investigation.

events.title: Post-Epstein Indictment Investigation Summary
events.description: An update memo was prepared summarizing the investigation following Jeffrey Epstein's indictment.

events.title: Request for Case File Access
events.description: A request was made to grant a U.S. Attorney's Office member access to the shared drive for the US v. Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain within the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding access to case materials.
A December 2019 memo summarizing the post-indictment investigation into Jeffrey Epstein was referenced and attached.
The shared drive for the case 'USv.Epstein-2018R01618' was the subject of the access request.
The correspondence indicates ongoing case review and coordination among prosecutors in July 2020.
